title: Download正版启动器
author: 我的大刀是蛮子
txt_content:
求一个正版启动器！！！！！最近电脑出了问题，我重装系统后，正版启动器莫名其妙的不在了，但是官网不给我下载！DownloadWhen you have bought the game, you can download the stand-alone launcher for Minecraft here. It will automatically update the game files with the latest version. You'll be able to play the game without an Internet connection if you've been online at least once. 


求一个正版启动器啊

replies.author: zhangcl
replies.txt_content:
Minecraft.zip
(342.45 KB, 下载次数: 6385)



2014-6-22 15:13 上传
点击文件名下载附件





 明明就是点 Minecraft.exe

replies.txt_content: 下个谷歌浏览器，右击minecraft.exe 点击复制链接地址，然后再粘贴到QQ旋风里就能下载了
